data.eml:eml: Redescription of Eremiascincus fasciolatus (Günther, 1867) (Reptilia: Squamata: Scincidae) with clarification of its synonyms and the description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mecke, Sven, Doughty, Paul, Donnellan, Stephen C. (2013): Redescription of Eremiascincus fasciolatus (Günther, 1867) (Reptilia: Squamata: Scincidae) with clarification of its synonyms and the description of a new species. Zootaxa 3701 (5): 473-517, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3701.5.1
